'''1.8.1-pre1''' is the first pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.8.1]], released on October 15, 2014.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20141017223906/https://mojang.com/2014/10/minecraft-1-8-1-pre-release-1/|title=Minecraft 1.8.1 Pre-release 2|website=Mojang.com|date=October 15, 2014|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Command format ===
'''[[Commands/gamerule|Game rules]]'''
* <code>doEntityDrops</code>: Works like <code>doTileDrops</code> but applies to entities instead.<ref name=bugfixcomment>{{bug|MC-6594#comment-202107|Non-living entities (boats, minecarts, fallingsand, item frames, paintings) drop items even if doTileDrops is set to false}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Jack o'lantern]]s'''
* Can be used to create [[iron golem]]s and [[snow golem]]s again.

=== Items ===
'''[[Bow]]s'''
* Bows are no longer upside down when held in the inventory.

'''[[Map]]s'''
* Changed some colors.

'''[[Potion of Leaping]]'''
* Can now be extended with redstone, like any other potion.

=== Mobs ===
'''General'''
* No longer run from creepers.

'''[[Armor stand]]s'''
* Added <code>Marker</code> tag.

=== World generation===
'''[[Witch hut]]s'''
* Newly generated witch huts can spawn witches on Y 64 to 71.
* This allows for three spawning floors in witch farms.

=== Command format ===
'''[[Commands/gamerule|Game rules]]'''
* <code>doTileDrops</code> no longer affects entities.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Credits]]'''
* Ryan Holtz (TheMogMiner) and Michael Stoyke (Searge) are now mentioned in the credits.

=== General ===
'''[[Options]]'''
* Renamed "Multiplayer Settings" to "Chat Settings" from 1.5.x and lower.

'''Performance'''
* Various improvements.
